description: Manage everyday life and keep the whole family in the loop with Cozi, Appy Award Winner for Best Family App, BMA Gold Winner for Best Mobile Calendar, and named a "must-have app for a better life" by The TODAY Show. There is nothing stationary about your life, so why depend on a family calendar that hangs on a fridge or wall? Cozi is the leading choice for families and includes a colour-coded calendar, shopping lists, to-do lists, family journal and more. Cozi also offers a premium ad-free version with additional features called Cozi Gold (available as an in-app purchase). Cozi Family Organizer is shared, so you only need one account for the whole family. Cozi's free features include: FAMILY CALENDAR • An easy to use colour-coded calendar, view an individual's schedule or the whole family at once • Add or edit appointments that everyone in the family can see • Set reminders so no one misses football practice or an important event SHOPPING LISTS • Shared grocery lists the whole family can access • Retrieve a list when you are at the supermarket and quickly cross off items or add new ones while you are shopping • See items added by other family members when you are on the go, no more coming home with everything but the one thing you needed TO DO LISTS • Create a shared to-do list, a list for your other half or checklists for the kids • Have your tasks right there in your pocket to remind yourself or send them to a family member to remind them • Create as many lists as you want - emergency supplies lists, packing checklists, school trip supplies list and more FAMILY JOURNAL • Jot down a special moment and add a photo all while you are on the move • Cozi's journal is designed especially for busy mums and dads, so it's quick and easy to keep favourite memories you don't want to forget • Add any photograph from your iOS 8 device right to the Family Journal quickly and easily with Cozi Journal share extension OTHER THINGS YOU SHOULD KNOW • Your Cozi calendar, shopping lists, to-do's and family journal are accessible from any mobile device. • The whole family shares one account that everyone can access using their own email address (as specified in Settings) and the shared family password. • For more information about the ad-free version of Cozi, tap "Cozi Gold" on your app home screen. Premium features include: Contacts, Birthday Tracker, mobile app themes, more reminders, mobile month view, change notifications and more. RAVE REVIEWS ABOUT COZI • "Cozi is, in short, ridiculously handy. My only regret is that I waited this long to start using it." –PC World • "Cozi organises my life!" –goodtoknow.co.uk • "Too good to be true." –Family Fun Magazine • "Incredibly helpful." –Better Homes and Gardens • "An online calendar we love." –Parents Magazine
release_text: Introducing Cozi, localised for the UK including: proper date and time format, UK holidays, British-English spelling

Paktor is the #1 free social app that is changing the socializing and dating world. With millions of users on Paktor, you can easily match and chat with new friends. No awkward introductions, just find people near you, filter by preferences, swipe, match, chat, meet and date! Paktor is a socializing app that acts as your instant introduction to people you are interested in. As you scroll through photos of people who are in your area, you can “like” them or “pass” them. If you like a person and they like you back, it will be a match and Paktor sets you two up to talk and chat through the social messenger features. There are people you’d like to meet and people who would like to meet you. Paktor makes sure the two match up. With Paktor as your matchmaker, socializing, dating, or just hanging out becomes that much easier. Paktor features: - Change the way you look at dating, socializing and meeting new people - Get paired up with people who like you and are in your area - Only people who like you will be able to see if you liked them, keeping everything anonymous - If you made a mistake, no worries! Change your accidental dislikes to likes - Send match requests to people you really want to meet - Set your search preferences by age, location, distance, gender, countries and more to help you find that perfect match to talk to - Personalize your profile with photos, taglines and descriptions of yourself - Use photos from your camera, camera roll and Facebook in your profile Paktor media mentions: - featured on BBC - featured on CNBC - featured on Yahoo - featured on Techinasia - featured on Sina and more... description: This is the PRO version of Here I Am! You don't want to have banners? Well, this is your choice! Never forgot the road to a place where you had already been? Never need to tell a friend where you are? Well, with I'm Here this won't be a problem anymore! WHY USING 'Here I am!' : [] NOTIFICATIONS: NEW ( BETA) : Now you can send your position without opening the app! If one of your friends sends you a message containing the keyword phrase ' Where are you? ' , 'Here I am !' will send a notification telling you that the contact requires your location! So you can send it, from the notification area, without any problem! [] SELECT THE LOCATION PROVIDER (ATTENTION) : 'Here I am!' allows you to choose which system to use for checking your current location :  - Google Play Services : slower but more accurate, supported by most devices.  - Location Provider: fast and supported by all devices. CAUTION: Some devices, like HTC and Samsung GALAXY, could have a higher accuracy by using the Location Provider. [] CHECK IN : find very quickly the coordinates of the places where you are! [] SENDING THE LOCATION: send locations to your friends by using one of the many supported applications! SMS / MMS, Whatsapp , Facebook Messenger , Mail, Skype, Viber , LINE are only a small part of them ! . [] SAVING YOURS LOCATIONS : Save your places in your favourites , you can navigate to them at any time! In the absence of a connection, the search will show you only the coordinates of the place . But don't worry! You can use the 'Update' option to view the address! [] CROSS-PLATFORM LINK: 'Here I am !' generates links designed specifically for each platform! Before sending a location, choose to which platform ( iOS , Android, WP8 ) send your position ! In the case of Android or WP8 , two links will be created:  - Link to the Maps application of the specific platform.  - Links that open the position directly in 'Here I am !' . In this way you can save locations sent from your friends! [] SUPPORTED NAVIGATORS: Choose your favorite navigator! Currently the application supports:  - Google Navigator  - Waze  - Navigon  - Mireo viaGPS  - Wisepilot (only when available the way! )  - CoPilot GPS - Sygic --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- We are pleased to respond to your every request or question! Write to us at : teo.4@hotmail.it Or directly from the application, by clicking on : 'Contact us' --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- If you like the app, don't hesitate to put a review!
release_text: Version 7.3.1: - Place Card options added! - Now you can choose the keywords for the smart sms option!! - NEW: Create a Circle adding contacts to your keywords! Your location will be sent automatically to them!! Version 7.2.4: - Backup option added! Now you can save your favourite places and restore them! (if you are an App of the Day user you'll save even your promo account!) - Better translations inserted!

description: 旅行情報サイト「じゃらんnet」のAndroidアプリです。全国２万軒以上の宿泊施設を行き先や最寄駅から検索することができます。 「じゃらん出張ビジネス」アプリでは、 ・"いつも" 利用する駅・エリアの履歴を保持して一発検索 ・"いつも" 利用するホテルのみから空室一括検索 ・喫煙／禁煙といったこだわり条件も保持 といった“いつもの”検索の利便性を上げることで、「出張ビジネス」でよく利用をする宿泊施設・宿泊条件での検索をより簡単にしています。 また、最寄りの駅を指定した駅周辺の宿泊施設検索や最寄り駅までの乗換案内機能も提供しており、これらの機能により、「出張ビジネス」用途の宿泊施設探しの利便性向上を図ります。 【アクセス権限について】 - 現在地 (GPS/ネットワーク基地局) 地図検索やルート検索で現在地の緯度経度を取得します。 - ネットワーク通信 宿泊施設の検索や予約確認のためインターネット通信を行います。 - カレンダーの予定の読み取り 予約確認のカレンダーへ登録画面において、登録先カレンダーの選択リストとして端末内のカレンダーリストを表示します。 - カレンダーの予定の追加 予約確認のカレンダーへ登録画面においてカレンダー登録を行う場合に、端末カレンダーへ登録を行います。 - 端末のステータスと ID の読み取り 利便性の向上及び統計データ作成の為にアクセスログ、エラーログを取得しています。 ※法的に要求された場合を除き、第三者にアクセスログは公開しません。 【ご注意】 ・ログインができない方へ ブラウザの設定で、「JavaScript有効」「Cookie許可」をオンにして再度お試しください。※情報提供していただいた方、ありがとうございます。 It is the Android app travel information site for "Jalan net". You can search from the nearest station or destination accommodation of more than 20,000 hotels across the country. App "Ran Business reviews Well" is -One-shot search maintains a history of the station area to use "always" · The vacancy global search from the hotel only to be used "always" · Good and smoking / non smoking also hold By increasing the convenience of search "usual" and, we have to more easily search of accommodation and accommodation conditions for the frequently used in the "business trip business". In addition, we also provide transfer guidance function of the nearest station and Accommodation around the station that specifies the nearest station, the function of these, we will strive to improve convenience of looking for accommodation of "business trip business" applications. About Access Privileges] - You are here (GPS / network-based) I get the latitude and longitude of the current position in the route search and map search. - Network communication Make the Internet communication for a reservation confirmation and search of accommodation. - Reading of calendar events In the registration screen to Calendar of booking confirmation, to display the calendar list in the terminal as a selection list of registered destination calendar. - Add calendar events When performing the registration calendar in the registration screen to Calendar of booking confirmation, register to the terminal calendar. - Read status and ID of the terminal I'm getting access log, the error log for statistical data creation and improvement of convenience. ※ With the exception of the case where it is legally required, are not open to the public access log to a third party. [Note] - To the person who can not log in In your browser settings, please try again by turning on "Enable JavaScript" and "Cookie permission". ※ The one that had you provide information, thank you.

app_name: NYC Bus Time For All MTA / NYC
description: With this NYC app you don’t have to wait at the bus stop for the bus to come. It will tell you exactly when the bus will come to your stop. Use your phone GPS to find nearby bus stops in New York City. This app will give you the MTA bus arrival time at your selected stop. If bus time is not available, it tells you where your bus is! This NY app is designed for speed and simplicity. It combine function with taste. I hope it will bring you a little comfort in your journey during the cold weather. Please do not hesitate to contact me at ustransit74@gmail.com for any assistance and feedback. Features: -MTA bus tracker! We bring you bus tracker information, right to your mobile device! -Closest MTA routes in NYC lookup based on your location -Simple and useful home screen widgets that are resizable, scrollable and screen lock enable -The route widget enable you to transfer bus at the right places. -MTA Bus location and subsequent stops on Google Map. -NYC bus Map search for bus stops as user pan the map. -Multiple single 1x1 widgets. One for going to work and one for going home. -Route map with all buses for a particular route All New York Bus are live now! Bus routes and stops are up to date. The built in home screen widgets makes you feel more in control of your journey as just a glance on your phone's home screen tells you all you need to know. Bronx Brooklyn Manhattan Queens and Staten Island. Data is licensed by New York MTA Bus Time. Bus NYC app is developed by an individual. Cost: Free Don't wait for the bus. Meet it. Have fun!

description: Você está entediado e quer passar o tempo e se divertir com charadas? Que tal baixar este aplicativo Charadas? São várias piadas à sua disposição!!!! Falando nisso... - Qual o lugar em que todos podem sentar, menos você? - Tem coroa mas não é rei, tem raiz mas não é planta? Ficou curioso??? Então descubra as resposta à todas essas charadas baixando este aplicativo. Para ler as respostas de charada, aperte no botão "Ler Resposta" e para voltar à pergunta, pressione novamente o mesmo botão. Você gostou da charada e gostaria de compartilhar com seus amigos??? Basta clicar em "Compartilhar" e escolher a melhor forma de compartilhar. Você pode compartilhar via e-mail ou twitter, desde que o seu dispositivo Android possua suporte à esses aplicativos. ******** Nota Importante ******** No momento não é mais possível compartilhar a mensagem no Facebook devido à restrições de segurança imposta pelo site do Facebook. Desculpe-nos pelo transtorno. Assim que for possível contornar este problema, iremos fazer a atualização no aplicativo. ********************************* Não perca tempo e baixe já o aplicativo Charadas! Atenção: Se você não tem senso de humor e não curte charadas, nem baixe este aplicativo. Agora...se você curte charadas... Então baixe este aplicativo, pois foi feito especialmente para você!!!! :D Por favor, não esqueça avaliar e dar nota no Android Market. :) Todas as sugestões serão bem vindas. Are you bored and want to spend time and have fun with charades? How about downloading this app Charades? There are several jokes at your disposal!! Speaking of which ... - What is the place where everyone can sit, unless you? - Has crown but is not king, but it is not rooted plant? Are you curious?? Then discover the answer to all these riddles downloading this app. To read the riddle answers, press the button "Read Response" and to return to the question, press the same button again. You liked the puzzle and would like to share with your friends?? Just click "Share" and choose the best way to share. You can share via email or twitter, from your Android device has to support these applications. Important Note ******** ******** It is not currently possible to share the message on Facebook due to security restrictions imposed by the Facebook website. Sorry for the inconvenience. Thus it is possible to circumvent this problem, we will upgrade the application. ********************************* Hurry up and download the app now Riddles! Attention: If you have no sense of humor and do not enjoy riddles, or download this application. Now ... if you enjoy riddles ... Then download this app, because it was made especially for you!! : D Please do not forget to rate and give notes on the Android Market. :) All suggestions are welcome.

This is a free helper app for Ogre. This is not a standalone game! You will need a copy of the Ogre board game (or Ogre Miniatures) to play. Use the app to score a game for up to six players and any number of Ogres. The Combat Calculator lets you enter values for attackers, defender, and terrain, and roll for the result on the Ogre combat results table. The app also includes PDFs of the Ogre Record Sheets formatted for both the Ogre board game and Ogre Miniatures. Our thanks to the 5,512 backers who supported the Ogre Designer's Edition on Kickstarter and made this app possible! For more information, visit http://www.sjgames.com/apps/ogre . . . and for more about Ogre, visit http://www.sjgames.com/ogre/ Designed by Steve Jackson / Art by John Kovalic / Original code by J. Kira Hamilton / Ported to Android by Keith Blackard Permission Notes: We do not record or submit any of your phones information to anyone. We try not to be evil. * Network Communication - Full Network Access: Needed to grab the Ogre Site and Ogre News inside the application. * System Tools - Retrieve Running Apps: Needed exclusively to detect if Ogre is in the background for sound purposes. * Storage - Modify SD Card: Needed to copy backgrounds and PDFs to your phone for viewing.
release_text: Version 1.1 Changes: * This version has been optimized for Phones and Tablets! * Fixed Calculator for Ninjas (Rolls must be a minimum of 1) * If you encounter issues loading games, please try clearing the app's data and cache. ==== We are out of Beta! This has been made possible because of our active supporters. If you catch a bug, or have an idea for improving Ogre War Room, please send us feedback to apps@sjgames.com

The Guitar Pro application allows all guitarists to enjoy viewing, playing, as well as writing tablature easily, right from their mobile device. This mobile version of the famous Guitar Pro tab-editing program is the ideal companion for you to practice your favorite songs and share them at any time, anywhere! An arpeggio, a riff, a chord sequence ringing in your head? You can now note and save all this on the single-track tablature NotePad. Main features: ✓ Supporting GP3/4/5 and GPX (Guitar Pro 6) formats, ✓ Reading music scores purchased on the portal mySongBook, ✓ File import via USB, web server and file browser, ✓ Built-in file library with search, filter, and favorite, ✓ Multitrack playback with soundboard: volume, solo-mute, soundbanks, ✓ Metronome and visual countdown, ✓ 3 levels of zoom, ✓ Guitar or bass fretboard (for right- and left-handers), and virtual keyboard. Guitar Pro exclusive features: ✓ Single-track tablature NotePad, ✓ Instant tempo changes, ✓ Global transposing by half-tones, ✓ Tab, standard and slash notation,  ✓ Sending files via e-mail from the application, ✓ Exporting files to GP format, ✓ Playing any selection in loops, ✓ Adjustable sound quality ✓ Simplified navigation between sections. Guitar Pro is available for Android phones 2.2 Froyo version and higher. The display of the music score has been optimized for touchscreen tablets. ✄——————————————————————- You have a question ? Find us on : Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/arobas.music Twitter : http://www.twitter.com/arobasmusic Need help : https://support.guitar-pro.com

Dr TASK allows you, in a fast and easy way, to list, uninstall or manage all running tasks and installed apps in your device. Besides, you will be able to make and reinstall backup copies of your favourite apps. ☆☆ Dr TASK easy uninstaller free features ☆☆ ■ Easy uninstaller ■ Stop or kill running tasks ■ Hide tasks from running tasks list using a exclusion list ■ List all installed apps in your device ■ Watch apps data and cache sizes quickly ■ Have a look at CPU and RAM usage, battery level and available storage in real time. ■ Make and reinstall from backup copies of all apps APKs ■ Batch apps uninstalling ■ Automatic stop of running tasks to improve system performance and save battery ■ Automatic stop of tasks at app startup ■ Go to apps details page in a quick and easy way ■ Search any installed app on Google Play to check available updates and read comments and reviews ■ Go through the different options with its handy side panel. ■ Watch the number of running tasks, installed apps and backups done in the side panel. ■ Choose between two possible visual themes ■ Use of notifications when tasks are stopped automatically. ■ For Android 2.3 to 4.X Note: From Android 2.3 is not possible to stop foreground processes. In such cases, you have to force stop in the app details page. Some services could restart after stop them. Dr Task doesn't remove notifications shown by stopped processes.

Cyber Defense is an "arena" style tower defense game in which you battle to prevent your Android device from being overwhelmed by malware. Viruses, trojans, worms and all manner of other infections must be stopped from reaching your CPU by deploying a maze of various types of antivirus towers. Have fun! Coming soonish: - new virus types - speed up save game function; it's too slow at the moment - game performance tweaks - 2x game speed function - social network integration for global highscores and achievements
release_text: The game scoring system now includes an extra bonus score based on the amount of remaining power, rewarding players who make efficient use of their resources! (The power bonus is awarded only when the player beats the level's par time.)

description: “The Human World for Kids” - an educational game for children ages 2-4 from the series "Kids Learn Words". Together with your child, look at bright, colorful flashcards from the "human world" accompanied by sounds, learn the names of these man-made objects, and listen to the sounds they make! After the child has looked through all the flashcards, he or she can take a fun quiz to see how many of the words he or she has learned. Regardless of the number of correct answers given, and of stars earned, the child’s developing skills will be fostered by enthusiastic applause and floating balloons! The educational flashcards for kids are divided into the following categories: “Cars and Transport”, “Professions”, “Buildings”, “Musical Instruments”, “Tools”, “Furniture”, “Kitchen Tools” and “Clothing and shoes”. One important distinction makes this educational app stand out from the rest: instead of drawings, which are not always easy to identify as a real object, the child will see bright, beautiful and fun-spirited photographs. This will allow the child to “see” each object as it actually appears in the real world, while allowing the parent to tell the child more about this object. Does the youngster have an older brother or sister in grade school? They can also use this educational game! In addition to English, this app also supports the German, Russian and Ukrainian languages. While playing with the educational flashcards in a foreign language, a school-age child can effortlessly learn many new words with which to surprise their teachers and classmates. An A+ is guaranteed! The youngster does not need to be able to read in order to use this educational app. The simple interface and spoken clues allow even the youngest of children to play and learn independently. Experience has shown that children love to look through a series of colorful pictures with sounds, and they will ask to see them again and again. According to Glenn Doman, an American physical therapist and the founder of The Institutes for the Achievement of Human Potential, participating in these kinds of educational activities (for 5-10 minutes a day) stimulates the development of various regions in the brain. As a result, the child's photographic memory takes shape, the child develops much faster than his or her peers, and, beginning at infancy, the child gains access to a world of encyclopedic knowledge. The main point, in which Doman is undoubtedly correct, is that the younger a child, the more easily he or she can absorb new knowledge. It's important to make use of this ability while it's available!

When was the last time you got blamed for missing calls? Have you ever regretted missing important calls? Bid farewell to your sad past, say hello to "Don't Miss Calls"! Your resource-friendly, simple yet elegant assistant who will keep you aware of important calls, even if you are in Vibrate / Silent mode! - One button to toggle on / off the app - Simple, intuitive interface to add / modify and delete your list of important calls - Custom ringtones for your important calls - Import contacts from your phone book - Rewards for continous use of app - Non-intrusive: App only monitors your calls during silent/vibrate on, and only when you want it to - 100% AD free, 100% FREE - With less than 1MB in size, it almost doesn't take up any of your phone's storage space!
release_text: What's new: Version 1.1 - Bug fixes (Thanks Lenno for letting me know about the bugs! Truly appreciate it!) - NEW Global Settings: "Activation Mode" allows users to select when the app will be active! Either set it to be ALWAYS ON; active only during vibrate mode; or active only during silent (mute) mode. You are IN CONTROL!

Main features: - Support multiple cars/vehicle - Track cars, costs; delete and manage your cars in a very simple way! - Journal: write day by day your outgoings with each cars. You can insert: refueling, oil, wheel, battery, maintenance costs, tracking car's expenses, tax, insurances... - Calculate average consumption - Multiple units: miles, kilometers, litres, imp gal, US. gallon, km/L, L/100Km, mpg: higly customizable! - Multiple currencies: euro, dollar, pound, lira, yen and general current: higly customizable! - Backup function: import and export databases among multiple devices - Multiple car support - Statements: keep an eye on outgoings, monthly, yearly, with forecast for next months, with some curious info like total kilometers, days tracked etc. - Fuel average: look it for understanging your drive quality and car health - Chart function to browse stats in a very simple way. Same informations of Statistics but in a easier way - Clear and clean minimal interface, intuitive and easy to use and browse. - Export function: save and print your car log with a single and simple tap - Car Calculator for estimates: how much cost a travel? how much distance can you do? ***** Features above and more other features in Car Manager! Try it now for free trial version!

description: Watch a different animated movie every day, then test your new knowledge with an interactive quiz. Featured Movie topics tie in to current events, historical milestones and figures, holidays, and more! This app is perfect for informal, exploratory learning at home or on the go. Want even more access to BrainPOP's award-winning content? Log in with your school's username (free!) or choose an optional in-app subscription. Give your kids the chance to explore hundreds of Science, Math, Social Studies, English, Engineering & Tech, Arts & Music, and Health subjects right on their mobile devices. All movies are close captioned, so it’s easy for them to read along. In-App Subscription Options: “BrainPOP Explorer Subscription” – The free Featured Movie and its quiz plus four additional related movies and quizzes, rotating every day. “BrainPOP Full Access Subscription” – The free Featured Movie and its quiz plus unlimited access to all of BrainPOP’s 750+ movies and quizzes. For more than a decade, BrainPOP has been a trusted, go-to source of animated, educational content. With more than 11 million visits a month to our sites, we’re used by millions of students in thousands of schools, at home, and on mobile devices around the globe. description: As the name suggests - it’s just like rummy, except that in this game players have to form new words from the given open cards having alphabets. It can be played alone or the player can invite his/her online friend to play this Android game. At the same time, it can be played either online or offline, both. A great initiative adding knowledge and vocabulary to your mental data bank! The player has to create meaningful and correct words using the displayed open cards. The player can flip, drag and place the right sequence of alphabets to make a word from the left side open cards panel! For players’ convenience “Hint” button is also provided to get clues for creating a word from the available open cards. Every alphabet will carry a separate value i.e., between 1-10, to calculate the difficulty level of the words created and accordingly providing scoring. The game has two levels of difficulty with separate time limit, number of hints and bonus points for the winner of separate levels. Players will get various scores based on specific scoring system! Real time play brings two options – ‘Auto Match’ and ‘Invite and Select Opponent Manually’. There are several levels of achievement to rejoice for the players, which can be achieved at various stages of game on fulfilling specific conditions. In addition, the bonus offering is - player can get incremental achievements based on the number of games they played. On playing 20 games, player will be called a "Freshman", on playing 50 games will win "Sophomore" status and on competing 150 games he/she would be crowned with the title of a "Graduate". Now stay tuned with your FaceBook Connections in Word Rummy! Facebook Sharing Features - Share Leaderboard Score - Share Your Achievements on FB - Invite FB Friends to Play - Seek Help from FB Connections While Playing Game So, are you eager to reach out the expert level of a Graduate? Try it out!!
release_text: - Daily challenge - Tutorial Mode for newbie - Get Facebook comment of your help post on Game Play screen

app_name: Things To Take 出門手記
description: Always forget to bring something before go out? Struggling what should be prepared of your travel? If so, this App should help you a lot. Before going out, open this App and choose a function you are going to do. It will then display a "Things To Take" list. With this, you will never forget to take things! Support English, Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese. ============================================================ 是否總會忘了帶東西出門？是否去旅行但不知道要準備什麼？ 如果是的話，這個應用就幫到你了！ 你只要在出門之前打開它，選擇你出門的目的，就會出現一張清單，提醒你有什麼需要帶出門。 這樣以後就不用再忘東忘西了！ 本應用程式支援繁體中文，簡體中文及英文。

NEED TO PRACTICE FOR YOUR RADIO EXAM? Our FCC Commercial Radio Exam App "FCC GROL Exam" helps you to study for your FCC General Radiotelephone Operator License (GROL) To obtain an FCC commercial operator license, an applicant must submit an original Proof of Passing Certificate issued by a Commercial Operator License Examination Manager (COLEM), or have the application filed electronically by the COLEM, demonstrating that the applicant has passed the required written elements. For the FCC General Radiotelephone Operator License the required written elements are: Element 1 : Basic radio law and operating practice with which every maritime radio operator should be familiar. To pass, an examinee must correctly answer at least 18 out of 24 questions. Element 3 : General Radiotelephone. Electronic fundamentals and techniques required to adjust, repair, and maintain radio transmitters and receivers. To pass, an examinee must correctly answer 75 out of 100 questions. FEATURES * includes all actual and up to date questions * intelligent learning mode and actual test mode * all charts and figures included * sound on/off option * timer on/off option * showing/hiding the correct answer * statistic analysis of your learning progress * questions and answers are sorted randomly Please email apps@kulanamedia.com for any issues or suggestions.We appreciate your feedback.

Battleship Multiplayer is clasic board game with two players, each player has two own boards, one for him self, the other one for the opponent. This game is playable on the one device, which has to be sent between the players or on network game, where one player starts the game as a server and the other one as a client. Possible playing is on one wifi network, or between two players connected via 3G/Edge or one of the players can create acces point and the other one connects to that network.

Often duplicated, replicated, and imitated, this is the one, the only, the Original Flurry live wallpaper for android. Gorgeous mac osx style flurry live wallpaper natively rendered on your phone, no videos here! Live wallpaper has an extensive range of settings to finely tune the look and feel: Display: * Multiple Flurry - Want more than 1 flurry? Now you can have up to 5 flurrys up on the screen, each with their own custom color! * Background - Select any image from your gallery as a background behind flurry. * Color - Select a color from a wide range of presets or choose your own custom color. * Stream Count - One or more particle streams per flurry. * Star Speed - Want flurry to dance a jig or move through tar, either way we have you covered with the speed controls. * Particle Speed - Speed of particles traveling, makes sense right? * Brightness - On stage or off, you can control the brightness or dimness of flurry to match your device for that perfect look. * Thickness - Some people like it thick, some thin, we try to satisfy all needs. Interaction: * Touch Event - Want to interact with flurry? Poke anywhere on the screen and flurry will go there and obey your command. Tap again to have flurry resume rendering, we even give you a setting to resume automatically if you want :). * Swipe Event - Throw flurry for a loop by swiping back and forth from screen to screen as gusts of wind hit flurry from all directions. Phone Status: We want our customers to have the best experience possible and are actively maintaining the opengl compatibility of flurry with new phones as they are released : * We need to release an update to support lollipop as the update broke backwards compatibility for native code. There will be a small delay in the update due to having to drop active support for the moment due to medical issues. I apologize for any inconvenience and thank everyone who has commented and shown their support so far. To Open A Live Wallpaper: One of the most difficult issues in the marketplace ;). Go to your HOME screen and press settings->wallpaper->live wallpapers. If you have an issue opening up the wallpaper contact support@popboxstudio.com and we'll walk you through it. If you have any problems at all dont hesitate to e-mail us at support@popboxstudio.com . To learn more about flurry check out the product page at http://popboxstudio.com/wp/products/flurry/ and browse our forum at http://popboxstudio.com/wp/support/ .
release_text: * Improved rendering quality for larger screen sizes like the HTC EVO 4g LTE and the SGS3

description: This is the full version of Big Sport Fishing. Enjoy beautiful panoramic views and stunning 3D graphics in this exciting fishing game! As you move your phone, the games view changes so you feel like you're really there. Realistic 3D fish can be seen swimming beneath the waves when they are close and will often jump to give away their location when farther away. When you see a big one just flick your wrist to cast. Pull back on your phone to hook a fish and fight it as you reel in your catch. After you catch a fish you can take a picture to view later or share with friends! The full version has 10 fishing locations. Free version available! Try before you buy! In Big Sport Fishing you can earn virtual credits to acquire special bonus items. These credits can also be purchased using an In-App purchase. Permissions: Big Sport Fishing uses the WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission to write save game data to your phone's external storage.
release_text: The latest version contains bonus items like Chum, Dogfish Repellent and additional fishing rods. Earn these items to gain a special advantage in the game and catch more fish!

description: Ihre Finanzen im Griff – immer und überall mit der neuen BBBank-Banking-App Jetzt komplett überarbeitet im neuen Design und mit neuen Funktionen Legen Sie die Funktionen, die Sie oft benötigen, als Favoriten an. Behalten Sie Ihre Finanzen stets schnell und bequem überall im Griff. Ob von unterwegs mal eben den Kontostand abrufen, kurz die letzten Umsätze der Kreditkarte prüfen, eine dringende Überweisung erledigen oder Börseninformationen einholen und mobil handeln? Kein Problem mit der neuen BBBank-Banking-App. Legen Sie die Funktionen, die Sie oft benötigen, als Favoriten an. Sie haben nicht nur Ihre BBBank-Konten und weitere Bankverbindungen in der Tasche, sondern behalten auch Ihr Online-Depot und Entwicklungen und der Börse genau im Blick. Das schnelle Abrufen von Marktdaten und mobiles Handeln vom Smartphone wird dadurch zum einfachen Spiel für Sie. Diese Funktionen und Services können Sie nutzen: • Ihre persönliche Kontenübersicht • Umsatzanzeige • Überweisung / Terminüberweisung (Inland und SEPA, jetzt auch per QR-Code möglich) • Umbuchung • Kreditkartenumsätze • Verwaltung von Daueraufträgen • Anzeigen der noch nicht abgerechneten Umsätze • Finanzmanager • Mitteilung an die Bank • Serviceaufträge an die Bank • Telefonische Weiterleitung zur Sperrhotline • Geldautomatensuche • Abrufen von Online Depots • Wertpapiere kaufen und verkaufen • Wertpapier Watchlist • Aktuelle Kurs - und Marktinformationen • Informationen und Kontaktmöglichkeit zu Ihrem persönlichen Berater Multibanking Ein großes Stück mehr Flexibilität und Kontrolle über Ihre Finanzen. description: SRF Verkehrsinfo hält Sie über die aktuelle Verkehrslage auf den Schweizer Strassen auf dem Laufenden. Anhand von Webcam-Bildern können Sie das Verkehrsaufkommen selber beobachten. Ausserdem erfahren Sie, in welchen Parkhäusern in grösseren Städten noch Plätze frei sind. Hauptfunktionen von „SRF Verkehsinfo“: • Informationen zur aktuellen Verkehrslage auf den Schweizer Strassen mit folgenden Kategorien: Verkehrslage, Strassenzustand, Baustellen, Pässe, Tunnelzufahrten, Autoverlad, Parking und Webcams • Kartenansicht mit Infos zum Verkehrsfluss • Locate-me-Funktion: positioniert die Karte an Ihrem Standort. • Listenfunktion mit Meldungen in der Nähe und Favoriten • Push-Nachrichten-Dienst für wichtige Autobahnabschnitte • Staumelder und Notfallnummern • Informationen zum Bahnverkehr • Sprachversionen deutsch, französisch (RTS trafic) und italienisch (RSI.ch traffico) SRF Traffic keeps you informed of the current traffic situation on the Swiss roads to date. Using webcam images You can watch the traffic itself. You will also learn where car parks in major cities there are places available. Key features of "SRF Verkehsinfo": • information about the current traffic situation on the Swiss roads following categories: traffic, road conditions, construction sites, passports, tunnel entrances, car transport, parking and Webcams • Map with information about the traffic flow • locate me function: positions the map to your location. • List function with messages near and Favorites • Push-message service for major highway sections • congestion indicators and emergency numbers • information on rail services • languages ​​German, French (RTS trafic) and Italian (RSI.ch traffico)
release_text: SRF Verkehrsinfo hält Sie über die aktuelle Verkehrslage auf den Schweizer Strassen auf dem Laufenden. Anhand von Webcam-Bildern können Sie das Verkehrsaufkommen selber beobachten. Ausserdem erfahren Sie, in welchen Parkhäusern in grösseren Städten noch Plätze frei sind.

description: We perfectly recreate concept of flat! Needs no explain. Let's see with your own eyes! ***Main Features: - Home screen Lock option - Atom Bar: Google search, digital clock, clock + Quick Setting, clock + Google Search - Streamlined Widgets: Memory Cleaner, Flash, Clock, Memo Calendar, Contact, Settings and Search Bar - Gestures: Pinch, Double Touch, Slide, Long-Touch - Edit tray: Simple and easy management of applications with a quick and easy edit mode. - Smart Folders: Supports customizable folders on your home screen. You can resize folders and directly launch without opening the folder. - 2 Folder Styles : Supports both thumbnail shapes and basic shapes. - Dock Bar: Access up to 20 of your favorite apps instantly, includes various filter effects, screen settings and opacity adjustment capability. - Beautiful and Simple Themes: New, custom themes are being continuously released through the Atom Store. Designed to be minimalistic and beautiful. - Multi-Wallpaper: Automatically switch between 3-24 different wallpapers when the display is turned on/off. - Icon Customization: Mix and match icons and gallery images between themes. - Point Color Change: Atom bar menu icon, guide line’s color can be changed with color picker. - Live Background: Brings your background into the 21st century – beautiful animated backgrounds. - Wide-Ranging Theme Support: Supports existing SSKIN and GO launcher themes. - Hide Application Icons: Selectively hide app icons to keep your Home clean and organized. (Hidden apps can be searched through All apps serach option) - Home Screen Copy: Copy the home screen you have set up via another launcher over to Atom Launcher. - Customizable App Grids: Size the Grid determining the amount of Apps visible on your home screen and All Apps screen to a max of 6*6 and 5*6 apps respectively. - Backup / Restore Settings: Backs up your settings with up to three different themes and icon sets. ▶ Atom Family - All in One Widget Provides Widgets - Memo, Monthly Calendar, Daily Calendar, Quick Settings, Contacts, Search Bar, Digital Clock, and Analog Clock. - Atom Store With the participation of a few famous illustrators, artists and actors, we are building out a rich and diverse library of themes and icons for your Android. (You can also search for widgets via the Atom Store) ***PLEASE READ - Available from Android OS version 4.0.2 and above - Requires 10 MB space to save theme resources - To enhance usability, installed theme doesn’t appear - Not available for Tab Devices (Extra-Large Screens) - Badges: Display missed call, unread messages (ATOM only supports default apps on your Android device, does not support device-specific functions) - Due to resolution issues, service is currently inactive for “Optimus View” *** Customer Support We listen to your feedback and are continuously trying to improve – if you have any comments, ideas or feedback, please leave a review or come say hello on our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/Atom.Launcher.Global

Splashtop for SECTOR works with SECTOR -based enterprise workspaces, including AT&T Toggle, BlackBerry Secure Work Space, and Deutsche Telekom SAMBA! If you are unsure if you have a SECTOR workspace, or if you do not have a SECTOR workspace and would like to obtain one, please contact your company’s IT administrator. If you are not an enterprise user, please consider Splashtop Enterprise! Splashtop for SECTOR is a simpler, higher performing, and cost-effective alternative to traditional Citrix and VMware VDI. It enables IT departments to deliver corporate apps and desktops (physical and virtual) to tablets, smartphones, PCs, Macs, and thin clients. It supports Microsoft RDS / RemoteApp. Splashtop for SECTOR eliminates the complexity and expense of mobilizing all of your hard-to-access apps -- Zero Coding, Zero Training, Zero Data Leakage, Zero VPN headache, Complete Control, Superior Performance. Top industry adoptions include government, financial, healthcare, and manufacturing with 3D CAD. Over 15 million users enjoy Splashtop: http://www.splashtop.com/enterprise . *** For personal use only please search for Splashtop Personal app *** Splashtop Enterprise delivers: + Fast, cost effective high-performance alternative to VPN, RDP, VNC, Citrix + “Last mile” extension for VDI and RDP environments + On-premise deployment – secure and protect sensitive data + Active Directory (AD) - Integrate with your existing AD for local authentication and authorization + IT remote support solution+ Centralized control - Set user and device access policies, activate/deactivate users and devices, centralized streamer updates , bandwidth throttling + Reporting - View real-time connections and audit trails + Grouping - Allow access to shared pool of physical or virtual desktops + Multi-device support - Supports iPad, iPhone, Android tablets, Android phones, Mac and PCs + Support for other MDMs include Good Technology and OpenPeak (also known as AT&T Toggle) available + Easy to setup, get your team setup and running in an hour How users benefit + Access anytime – Be able to securely access your Windows applications & data on your PC / MAC remotely from any mobile device, any time, any where + Easy to use - Intuitive gestures and menu interface delivers a native application experience including support for multiple displays + High performance - Patent pending streaming technology including 3D graphics, HD video and synchronized audio delivers a responsive and engaging user experience + Connect from anywhere - Intelligent optimization techniques provide reliable connections even when connected over lower bandwidth 3G and 4G connections + Secure connections - With support for SSL/AES 256 bit encryption, network proxies and SSL certificates you can be assured that your sessions are safe + Presentation and annotation capabilities (over .ppt, video, including Flash) that can be controlled via tablet and projected to a group

KALEID is the newest and coolest in spot the difference game! find the difference in kaleidoscope mirror images! There are up to 300+ levels for endless fun! If you missed the time limit, you will lose one life. Lives are regained at a rate of one every 15 minutes. - coin You can get coins by cleared levels or acquiring trophies. You need coins for you to buy an item in the shop. - detector loupe if you use this, then detect a difference in kaleidoscope. - recovery watch if you use this, extend 30 sec for your time limit.

description: This is the official email application for your Sony smart accessory. Support for Xperia™ smartphones and tablets only. With this app, you can view email notifications and content in your SmartWatch or smart audio accessory. Email smart extension will only interact with the default email application in Xperia™ smartphones from Sony. To use this app extension, you must have Smart Connect and the dedicated Sony app for your smart accessory installed on your Xperia™ smartphone or tablet. Note: When you have installed this app, it will be activated automatically in your smart accessory. It will not appear in your application screen or home screen. Open the application settings via Smart Connect or via the phone or tablet status bar. Works with: SmartWatch MN2, SmartWatch 2 SW2, Smart Wireless Headset pro MW1, Stereo Bluetooth® Headset SBH50, Smart Bluetooth® Handset SBH52. If you want to find more apps or app extensions for smart accessories from Sony, use ‘smart extension’ and ‘Sony’ in your search. If you want to develop apps or app extensions for innovative Sony accessories, go to www.sonymobile.com/developer. Android apps and app extensions by Sony are designed to work with Android smartphones and tablets. However, some manufacturers may have set compatibility limitations in their devices resulting in decreased functionality. Enjoy! description: Educational game for children customizable, allowing them to discover the sounds of animals, of musical instruments, of transport, or about their close environment of toys, of family, with tour on picture and sounds. See them become more alert, laugh, be surprised or frightened on hearing the sounds. An excellent application for very small children. This different languages of the game are: English, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Romanian and Chinese. Principles of the Functionality GAMES There are two distinct game modes: - Discovery Mode Images discovery. Select a game group, and touch a miniature image, to obtain an enlarged image with its name pronounced, text and sound corresponding to the image. Touch the screen again to return to the game group. - Playful Mode Game understanding Select a game group. The child is asked to touch a particular miniature image in the game group. The child obtains applause if this is the correct answer. The child also obtains an enlarged image with the name pronounced, text, and the sounds corresponding to the image. OPTION The option menu allows you to change the appearance of the game. - Change the language - Display the name of the selected photo - Pronounce the name of the photo on opening the selected photo - Play the sound associated - Show score result for learning mode - Manage the images displayed in a game group according to the preferences of the child ADD MY PHOTOS This section allows you to create your own game groups using your own photos To do this, first select an image to define the game group, then for each of the 12 images in the group, you may select a photo, the sound and a text. For example for a game group of the family, you would select a photo of the father with an appropriate sound , and the text ´†Daddy†ª BUY A GAME GROUP This section allows you to buy a new game group -A game group of a given theme -A blank game group for you to create your own theme For each game group, you can preview its contents and the price. Some game groups may be purchased through recommendations in Facebook/twitter or through personal SMS recommendations.

description: *** Designed for Tegra 3/4 ONLY!!! see the list of currently supported devices in recent changes tab *** *** Shield / Tegra 4 version with features like dynamic shadows, rich particles, post process effects... *** ** Complete list of supported devices can be found at http://forums.bistudio.com/forumdisplay.php?180-ARMA-Tactics-GENERAL ** Arma Tactics THD takes the best from the popular strategy genre... and goes mobile. The finest assets used in the critically acclaimed Arma™ series on PC now come to life on the mobile platforms, in one of the best looking mobile games to date. Arma Tactics is a turn-based close-combat strategy game, where the player takes control of a four-member Special Forces team. There are no given strategies, rails to move on, or paths to follow; it‘s up to the player to decide how he will play through both the story-driven missions and generated missions with randomized objectives. Whether using stealth or a more direct approach, players will need to use their strategic thinking and use both basic and advanced weaponry while facing many different opponents - ranging from unorganized local militia to smart and skilled mercenaries. With highly replayable missions, achievements, weapons to unlock and whole campaigns to be regularly added, Arma Tactics offers many hours of intense ever-changing action. Arma Tactics is now MOGA Enhanced! Available at major retailers, carrier stores and online at http://www.MOGAanywhere.com For Tegra-powered devices only - learn more on TegraZone available on Google Play * Having problems? Please drop us a line at support@bistudio.com * Want to know about upcoming content? Keep checking www.facebook.com/ArmaTactics

description: La messagerie vocale visuelle Free Mobile vous permet d'accéder à vos messages vocaux dans l'ordre souhaité, d'archiver et de transférer vos messages en toute simplicité (connexion 2G,3G ou 4G obligatoire). Cette application permet aussi d'utiliser simplement FreeWifi_secure et de suivre sa consommation grâce aux widgets proposés. **Cette application est compatible avec tous les forfaits Free mais nécessite une connexion data mobile** **Si vous avez un téléphone Dual SIM, suivez bien les indications affcihées lors du premier lancement.** **En cas de problème, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter via l'email ci-dessous !** Fonctionnalités : - notification de nouveaux messages - écoute des messages dans n'importe quel ordre - archive des messages dans le téléphone - rappel direct du correspondant - réponse par SMS - partage des messages (par email ou autre) - suppression des messages - ajout d'un numéro aux contacts - enregistrement d'une annonce d'accueil - configuration du délais avant répondeur (dans "Paramètres") - accès au suivi conso détaillé de la ligne - installation de la sonnerie "Free Revolution" (dans "Outils") - configuration simplifiée de FreeWifi_secure (dans "Outils") - widgets (redimensionnables) Communauté Google+ : https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/109128254615315988608/ Détails des permissions utilisées par l'application : Historique de l'appareil et des applis : pour debugger Contacts : pour associer le numéro d'un message reçu à un contact Position : pour utiliser des infos techniques sur les antennes (RNC, CellID, …) SMS : pour envoyer des SMS à un contact ayant laissé un message Téléphone : pour rappeler un contact ayant laissé un message Photos/Contenus multimédias/Fichiers : pour archiver un message (stockage externe de l'appareil) Micro : pour enregistrer une annonce d'accueil Information sur la connexion Wi-Fi : pour configurer FreeWifi_secure Identifiant d'appareil et infos appel : pour pouvoir activer et utiliser la MVV Autres : ajouter une MVV au système Si vous souhaitez accéder au beta test de l'application, cliquez ici : https://play.google.com/apps/testing/fr.freemobile.android.vvm Visual voicemail Free Mobile allows you to access your voicemail messages in any order, archive and transfer your messages with ease (2G connection, 3G or 4G required). Nike+ FuelBand is the smart, simple and fun way to get more active by measuring your everyday activity and turning it into NikeFuel. Your Nike+ FuelBand wirelessly connects to your app, allowing you to see your progress on your mobile device and get the motivation you need to get moving. · View your progress against your goal broken down by day, week, or month. · Save all your information directly to your Nike+ profile online. · Customize your device display, change the time and update your Daily Goal - straight from the app. · Track NikeFuel and intensity for specific activities with Nike+ Sessions. · Stay active by enabling Move Reminders in your Device Settings that encourage you to Win the Hour. · Compete for the top slot on your Friend leaderboard. · Stay constantly connected to your app with Bluetooth 4.0. To use this app, you’ll need a Nike+ FuelBand SE and a device running Android 4.3 or above. This app does not support the FuelBand 1.0. The Nike+ FuelBand app is optimized for the following devices: -Samsung Galaxy S5 -Samsung Galaxy S4 -Samsung Galaxy S3 -Nexus 5 -HTC One -Moto X

taxi.eu – book your taxi with 2 clicks! And now, you can pay your taxi cashless with the integrated taxi.eu payment. taxi.eu is the perfect taxi app for travellers in Europe. You are located through GPS, even without knowing the exact address you can order your taxi. Before you confirm the order, calculate the fare, distance and duration of your taxi ride. You can instantly see which taxi is in your area and when it will arrive. Follow the approach of your taxi live on your display. Upon arrival you will get a notification directly to your phone. taxi.eu is connected with more than 62,000 taxis and 160,000 taxi drivers in Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, Belgium, Austria, France, Switzerland, Czech Republic and Luxembourg. With a coverage of 100+ cities, taxi.eu is Europe's largest taxi booking portal – and new cities are added continuously! Functions:  • automatic location via GPS • see available taxis in your area • integrated fare, distance and travel time calculator • see the arrival time of your taxi • follow the approach of your taxi • notification when the taxi has arrived • integrated cashless taxi.eu payment • immediate order or reservation  • manage personal addresses as favourites • choice of numerous customer preferences • intuitive and easy handling taxi.eu is your reliable taxi app for Europe, working automatically in Berlin, Vienna, Prague, Zurich, Amsterdam, Hamburg, Munich, Rotterdam, Frankfurt on the Main, Stuttgart, Duesseldorf, Essen, Geneva, Leipzig, Hanover, Antwerp, Lausanne, Basel, Graz, Salzburg, Linz, Duisburg, Wuppertal, Bielefeld, Muenster, Augsburg, Aachen, Kiel, Wuerzburg, Wolfsburg, Rostock, Neumuenster, Ulm, Neu-Ulm, Pforzheim, Ludwigsburg, Aschaffenburg, Gaggenau, Pinneberg, Norderstedt, Ahrensburg, Wedel, Nuembrecht and Schenefeld. taxi.eu - Your free taxi app for a barrier-free stay in Europe. Download the taxi app now and enjoy our innovative service when booking your taxi cab. For more information about taxi.eu please visit: http://www.taxi.eu
release_text: Funktionen: •Automatische Ortung via GPS •Anzeige der Fahrzeuge in der Nähe •Integrierter Fahrpreis, -distanz und Fahrtdauerrechner •Anzeige der Anfahrtszeit des Taxis •Beobachtung der Taxianfahrt •Automatischer Hinweis sobald das Taxi eingetroffen ist •inApp-Payment (auf Wunsch bargeldlose Zahlung, z.B. mit PayPal) •Sofortbestellung oder Reservierung •Persönliche Adressen als Favoriten verwalten •Auswahlmöglichkeit zahlreicher Kundenwünsche •Intuitive Bedienung

description: All In One SMS Banking Application provides a safe, secure and hassle free way to leverage the various SMS banking features provided and supported by most leading banks in the country. Through this application, an user can compose and send across an SMS request to the various banks (that the user is associated with or banking with) with just a click provided the user’s mobile phone number is registered with the respective bank for SMS banking. Following are some of the salient features of this application:- * SMS Banking Made Easy – No need to remember multiple SMS codes, SMS banking phone numbers, key words linked to various services and sequence thereof for SMS banking. * One App does it All – No need to download and install separate mobile apps for respective banks the user is banking with. Through All in One SMS Banking App, an user can send SMS requests to most of the leading banks of India * Works Offline – Internet is required only for downloading the app for the first time from the respective app stores and for receiving regular updates and not for sending SMS requests. This offline feature helps the user a lot in case they do not have access to the ATM card/ATM machines and also no internet connection to access online banking but want to know certain information and details about their banks accounts. * Safe & Secure - No verification, No personal banking details required, No storage of data related to SMS banking as well as any personal details of the user is requested for and stored. The app has a locking feature to restrict the access. * Cost Effective – Saves lot of time and energy in terms of trips to the bank branches/ATM’s and helps avoid long queues. In addition to facilitating sending of SMS requests, this app can also help in locating bank branches and ATM’s in a particular city or neighbourhood. The only pre-requisite for using this application is that the phone number of the smart handset on which this app is being installed should be registered with the respective banks for use of its SMS services. Please note:- This app does not ask for and saves any sensitive information related to the user or their bank accounts. Using this application you can request to your Bank to get your Bank account related information also you can recharge your Mobile or DTH also it provide various options like #-Bank balance inquiry #-Mini statement #-Credit Card Payment due #-History of last few transactions #-Mobile recharge DTH recharge and so on... Above list differs as per the Banks

Hidden Words is a new word search high-score game with 28 categories and possibility to customize a look of the game as you want! You can change the color of the background, color of the highlight line and also color of the letters! There is unlimited number of color combination, so you will surely find a one that fits your eyes the best! And what more, once you set up the color combination it will be saved so next time playing you will see the exactly same one as you setup! Each category has its own leaderboard so do not forget to submit your score to a global leaderboard, you are playing against people all around the world! You can also submit your total score from all the categories! Complete as many categories as you can with the best score possible! The SUBMIT button for total score gets enabled every-time you achieve better score than your last one! How to play: Simply drag on the letter and move your finger horizontally, vertically or diagonally to select a word, find all the words from the list on the top. Your score depends on your speed! Enjoy Hidden Word search game! * 28 high-score categories - you are playing against people all around the world! * Your best score is saved locally! * You can customize a look of the game! There is unlimited number of combination! * Great fun for the whole family! Powered by Dolby® on supported devices

description: This is a patched version of "Midi Sheet Music". The original app: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.midisheetmusic Kudos to Madhav Vaidyanathan for publishing his app as open source. This patched version supports four additional features: 1) Volume control per track in 10% steps. 2) Left/Right control per track in 5 steps. 3) Metronom ticks 4) associate mime type "audio/midi" The code changes are available as patch for the Feature Requests 14 "Individual voice volumes and L-R playback", 16 "Add Metronome" and 18 "associate with MID-files ": http://sourceforge.net/p/midisheetmusic/feature-requests/16/ http://sourceforge.net/p/midisheetmusic/feature-requests/14/ https://sourceforge.net/p/midisheetmusic/feature-requests/18/ This is NOT a fork of the original project. As soon as the features are supported in the regular version, this project will be unpublished.
release_text: p3: Feature of issue #18 "associate with MID-files" was added. The Mime-Type "audio/midi" is associated with "Midi Sheet Music", so attachments of eMails can be opened directly.

Wave Unlock - ( Waving to Unlock / Cover to Lock ): Feature: - Unlock the screen by waving hand over proximity Sensor - Lock the screen by cover hand over proximity Sensor for few seconds - You can use smart cover to automatic turn on / off screen Detail Information - This application use Proximity sensor to capture the user waving in front of the screen to unlock the screen and Cover it to Lock the screen - If your mobile phone / tablet have Proximity, you can use this application to Lock / Unlock the Screen. - Helps you to prevent your Power button or home button for broken. -VERSION 5.0 New design, more stable version -VERSION 4.1 Add feature allow you to decease the sensitive of your sensor if you feel the phone's sensors too sensitive. It will reduce the sensitivity of the sensor, helping you avoid screen auto wake -VERSION 4.0 Small bug fixed - VERSION 3.9 Fix bug when cover to unlock at home screen -VERSION 3.8 Remove exit ads, so you can now exit this app without see the anoying Ads -VERSION 3.7 Remove ads in the bottom of screen Add guilde button for user know: how to uninstall this app - VERSION 3.6 Fix bug screen off cannot check to turn off function More stable - VERSION 3.5 FIX bug sceen off -VERSION 3.4 Add feature Cover phone to Lock screen By Default this feature does not enable, you can enable it in setting. You can use smart cover to automatic turn on / off screen -VERSION 3.3 Add new function allow user to show notification or not Remove ads when click setting button -VERSION 3.2 Fix bug: Service nerver be killed by system -VERSION 3.1 Remove some ads -VERSION 3.0 Fix bug -VERSION 2.9 Remove 8 permissions More sensitive sensor Sleep mode return Support android 4.3 - VERSION 2.8 Fix flash screen bug from some device Remove sleep mode function cause some error raised when use this feature - VERSION 2.7 Small bug fix for some device - VERSION 2.6 Fix bug when screen off, screen auto on for few times - VERSION 2.5 Add sleep time mode ( during this time, the sensor will off for battery saving ) -VERSION 2.4 Add Test Mode for you to test the Sensor Add Set screen time-out per seconds Add Set Auto Start Service on Boot Support more device android 2.1 and have 320 x 240 px (like samsung galaxy Y) Fix issue stop service after kill recents app -VERSION 2.2 Fix 5 seconds issue More battery saving More sensitive Support Android 2.1 and above -VERSION 2.1 - BATTERY SAVING: Update function when screen is on -> turn OFF the Proximity Sensor When screen is OFF -> turn ON the Proximity Sensor. So maybe when you turn off your screen and start test to unlock device, you thought it's not work. But in fact, it's wait about 5 seconds after screen off to start the sensor :). - Fix Scroll setting sensitive issue ( user don't have to restart service or restart Application to make Sensor sensitive changed ) - Some other bug fixed -VERSION 2.0 - You can adjust the sensitivity of the sensor - Added Lock Screen Widget for lock the screen - Notice if the machine does not support the Proximity Sensor - Small bug fix Tested on: - Samsung galaxy S4 - HTC One - Samsung galaxy S3 - Oppo Find 5 - Lg Lu6200 - Galaxy Note 2 - Samsung galaxy S2 - LG LTE 2 - LG Optimus G - HTC Evo 4g - Nexus 4 - Sony xperia Z - HTC rhyme - SKY A840 - Samsung galaxy note 2 - LG OPTIMUS L7 - .... - Almost device has Proximity sensor can use this feature :)

description: Your spaceship crashes on an abandoned planet and you are the lone survivor but that's not you only cause of worry. As you move around you find that the place is filled with alien beasts that have been at war with your planet and are ready to attack you at any time! Snow Gunship Battle is an action-packed FPS (First Person Shooter) shooting game that is bound to give you the chills. Grab your weapons and get ready to shoot down the attacking alien beasts as they try to remove annihilate you because of the war your planet had started centuries in this 3D game. There's no time to fool around, get ready for battle, the beasts are already onto you and attacking. Aim at the approaching enemy and use your gunship to shoot them before it's too late. The number of enemies increases with each wave and they come more and more lethal as the war wages on. They are on the assault because they aren't used to extra-terrestrial visitors and to them death is your only destiny. Snow Gunship Battle is equipped with mesmerizing 3D graphics, invigorating action-packed scenes, designed to give the player an exhilarating gaming experience. The game offers the player an amazing gaming experience in which the player has a double assault gunship rifle with unlimited ammo to be a shooter and shoot down the enemies. Snow Gunship Battle Game Features: - Realistic FPS (First Person Shooter) controller - Complete alien planet scene with amazing 3D environment - Engaging sound effects - User friendly GUI and controls - Various alien beast characters with unique characteristics - Action packed enemy characters - Enemy AI - Efficient weapon controls & movement How to Play: - Touch & drag anywhere on the right side of the screen aim/move/rotate your shooting weapon - Tap the left side of the screen to shoot and start your assault - Radar will show you the enemies as red dots - The shooting weapon has unlimited ammunition but time to respond is crucial

description: Map of the Subway of Santiago de Chile offline. If you are not in your own country, you probably need an offline map of Santiago subway. This map is a simple image, and we think that's all that you need. Isn't it? Mapa del metro de Santiago de Chile offline. Si tienes una cantidad de Gigabytes contratados, probablemente necesites un mapa offline del metro de Santiago. Este mapa es simplemente una imagen, como la que podrías obtener sacando una foto, pero perfectamente encuadrada, legible, y directamente accesible desde un icono. Creemos en la filosofía de mantener simples las cosas. Si un mapa de papel ha servido toda la vida, para que complicarse con aplicaciones complejas que "calculan" la mejor ruta. Un humano (tú) lo haces mejor.

description: Cyber Monday 99 cent sale price! MailForSure - Private and secure email communications Works with all email services, including Gmail, Hotmail, and corporate email systems. Secures your messages with advanced cryptography - RSA 2048 bit, AES 256 bit. Only those that have your public key can send you encrypted emails, and you can only send secure emails to those contacts whose public keys you have. The MailForSure app makes public key cryptography easy to use. This app is highly recommended for small businesses that are looking for a secure corporate email app for their employees. You are protected from interception by your carrier and by your email provider. Your email provider never has a copy of the unencrypted email. MailForSure comes with advanced user interface features to make email easier, including contact view sorting. FAQ - Default email app notifications: By default, the Android email application will provide notifications on new emails. MailForSure will also provide notifications. This will result in too many notifications. You will want to turn off notifications from the default app and use MailForSure as your primary email application. 1. Go to "Settings" in the default email app. 2. Select the account associated with your email address (may be multiple accounts/email addresses). 3. Uncheck "Email Notifications" Do this for each of the accounts you may have with the default email app or other downloaded third-party email clients (ie: Gmail app) so that you do not get multiple notifications for emails *from the accounts you have associated with the MailForSure app.*
release_text: First release. Features: End-to-end encryption Public key infrastructure based on RSA and AES 256. Peer-to-peer. Your carrier can't read it. Your email provider can't read it. Works with any IMAP or POP email provider (ie: Microsoft Exchange, Outlook, Gmail, Google Apps, Yahoo!, and many others).

description: Here it is! A live wallpaper and its main character - funny spider. He wove a cozy web on your screen and settled on it. The spider is very cheerful. He is always at your service running around the web carrying out your tasks. However, the spider is a big sleepyhead and falls asleep as soon as possible; and it's not that easy to wake him up! Key features: - choice of background; - choice of character; - leaf fall; - the spider moves to any point of the screen set by you or by himself; - when moving the spider puts his legs on a cobweb and looks at the target; - when you lock the screen, the spider closes his eyes and falls asleep, jerking his leg in a dream; - the spider wakes up when you click on a screen, blinks his eyes, waits for your tasks, or falls asleep again; - the application effectively uses the battery of your device stopping the animation when the device is locked; - for ease of use when you unlock your device, the app is almost inactive, reducing high CPU usage at this moment; - SDCard installation available.

Pyramid Solitaire is a game where there is a pyramid of cards. You need to remove all the cards in the pyramid. You will be surprised how addictive it is! There are already MILLIONS of gamers playing Pyramid Solitaire on the web for FREE! - Classic but challenging gameplay: K's can be removed by itself, while other cards must be removed by matching with another card that sums up to 13. - The kings can be removed by themselves but the other cards must be removed by matching with another card that sums up to 13. Awesome for people who play similar Android games, card games, puzzle games, or match three games, like Match 3, Angry Birds, Scrabble, Tap Fish, Farm Story, Paradise Island, War, Bejeweled, and hundreds of others. If you end up liking Pyramid solitaire there are lots of other free games from Fupa Games: - Bricks Breaking - Gems Swap - Pyramid Solitaire - Marble Lines - Bouncing Balls

description: This is just a workaround app for a bug in Android 4.1 (alias Jelly Bean). See http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=34880 for details. Info for Samsung users: at present you'll need this app too, see http://developer.samsung.com/forum/board/thread/view.do?boardName=GeneralB&messageId=232748 Under Android 4.4.2 it's recommended to install this app as well. There is a new issue in Android that causes accounts to be removed during an app update, see http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=66905 The bug causes accounts of paid apps to be removed when Android boots up. To work around this issue this app pretends to provide the same account type that SmoothSync for Cloud Calendar provides. That's enough to convince Jelly Bean to keep the account. That's all this app does. Please open the app at lease once from within Google Play to "enable" the workaround. It may not work properly otherwise. On some devices you'll have to install this app before you install SmoothSync for Cloud Calendar. Please try that if you still have problems. Please note that the bug is in Android 4.1, not in SmoothSync for Cloud Calendar! If you're not using SmoothSync for Cloud Calendar on Jelly Bean, you don't need this app. There is no need to give it a bad rating in that case! Please don't install it in that case.
release_text: improve compatibility with the new SmoothSync release

description: NOTE: use the SWIPE-TO-DELETE gesture to delete functions, equations, variables - NEW: statistics (gaussian test, t test, binominal and normal distribution, standard deviation, average, sum, median) - formula calculation with variables, sums, products and sequences - solve equations (linear, quadratic, cubic, transpose) - plot functions, derivate, integrate, calculate roots and extremas (polynomial, rational, exponential, etc) - calculate tangent, asymptote, interception - reconstruction: calculate f(x) by given roots, points or extremas - f(x,y) plot in 3D - factoring (Bézout's identity, Euler's totient function, least common multiple, greatest common divisor) - modulo calculation with big integer and fractions - differential and integral calculus - curve sketching, limes, minima, maxima - linear algebra, vectors, matrices - unit conversion - number systems, binary/oct/decimal/hex calculator - complex number calculation Supported languages: English, German, Francais, Espanol, Italian, Portuguese Mathematics is a powerful calculation software for your android smartphone. FEATURES Calculate any formula you want and show them in a 2d or 3d plot. The natural display shows fractions, roots and exponents as you would expect it from mathematics. In a few seconds you derivate or integrate your desired function, calculate the zero points of your function und show them in the function plot. See all maxima, minima or inflection points in one view. The easy way of use allows you to solve linear equations in just a moment. Or transform your mathematical, physical or chemical equation to any unknown variable. You often needs to calculate with binary, octal or hexadecimal number systems? No problem! You can mix them together in one calculation even by using decimal digits. But that's not enough! You can also calculate with any other number system with base 2 to 18. From time to time you may need to convert units to another one, like Celsius to Fahrenheit, miles to kilometre, inches to foot and so on. You will also be able to calculate with vectors, matrices and determinants. All this features are combined in this app and will make your mathematical life a lot easier.
release_text: - term calculator - intervall plot - improved equations (editable, plot) - improved 3d plot (contour) - settings (dark theme, zoom, and much more) - bug fixes

description: Do you like innovative Action Indie Games? Try Bronko Blue, our new atmospheric side scroller. „Game of the Day: Bronko Blue, the Kitten Copter (...) offers an atmospheric kitty-loving action title, perfect for those really boring commutes" - mobile-ent.biz „Feast your eyes on Bronko Blue, a stylistic new physics sidescroller that blends together the atmospheric action of Limbo with the one touch gameplay of Jetpack Joyride..." - supergamedroid.com „A new Game Bronko Blue the kitten copter will become a new addict.." - applecontroll.com „Just when you thought kittens were calm and boring animals Bronko Blue flips the stereotype..." - androidappdictions.com *** Highlights *** * 100% casual indie game * Simple touch controll * Atmospheric side-scrolling copter action game * Challenging journey through seasons and nightscapes * Physics based world with charming graphics * No In-App Purchase * More worlds and content coming in updates * 4 Worlds (Winter, Spring, Summer, Fall) * shooting, flying blue cat ;-) Bronko Blue, the kitten copter is an atmospheric side scroller. Bronko is a small blue cat who flies through the seasons and nightscapes searching for his lost wool. He must avoid or interact with obstacles along the way. The cat can shoot or ram stone towers or fight against windmills. Birds approach him which Bronko can shoot but not collide with. The missing balls of wool can be found along the way to receive bonus points. Bronko can use a torch to light his way in the dark. Visit us: https://www.facebook.com/bytecombo http://bronko.bytecombo.com/

The best of sicilian culinary tradition. The most famous sicilian recipes: from cassata to cous cous, from pasta alla norma to stuffed aubergines. Each recipe includes a detailed description with ingredients, preparation methods and photos. All texts are taken from Sicilia nel Mondo website. MAIN FUNCTIONS: • recipes grouped in different categories (appetizers, main courses, desserts) • menu ideas: 7 different menus to organise a perfect sicilian dinner • Favourite section, where you can add your favourite recipes • Shopping list, where you can add all the ingredients you need. You can choose ingredients directly from recipes or you can add them manually • new section for your recipes • possibility to share the best recipes with your friends • recipe du jour: a different recipe every day • vocal reading of the recipe • possibility to publish your recipes and send them by mobile phone • form to send suggestions for future releases. This APP is constantly evolving. If you want to add some specific functions, inform about a problem or advice additions, please send an e-mail to info@sicilianelmondo.com We will tell you if and when the upgrade is available. CONTACTS Web: http://www.sicilianelmondo.com Email: info@sicilianelmondo.com Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/SiciliaNelMondo Twitter: @sicilianelmondo

Finite Element Analysis of complex beam structures has never been easier! Make documentation of your work fast and simple and share it with your clouds, friends or co-workers. Totally free!!! No Adds, No payments, No trouble... Even hot girls can now become structural engineers;) Export your projects to the new EpicFEM Dynamics modul to perform Modal Analysis. Features: * Supports: * Simple * Clamped * Fixed * Springs: * Spring Vertical * Spring Rotational * Loading: * Nodal Force * Nodal Moment * Distributed loads * Triangular varying load Sections: * Database, EURO and US * Custom sections Materials: * Steel * Concrete * Timber * Aluminum * User-defined Diagrams: * Displacement * Rotation * Shear Force * Moment * Reactions * Write-2-PDF * Save PDF to SD-card * Load/Save projects * SI units * Imperial units Tags: FE FEM FEA Finite Element Method Analysis Beam Structure Mechanics Civil Engineering Calculations 2D Steel Concrete Timber Aluminum US Section Profile Free Custom Design Write to PDF Modal Dynamics Frequency Eigenvalue Eigenvector

This very simple golf stroke counter was designed to be used as a temporary way of keeping track of your score before entering it in your GolfShot type app. How it works: Click on the button to increase that players score, and the minus sign to subtract one. At the end of the hole enter the final score in your GolfShot type app and then hit "Reset Count". NOTE: This app is not designed to be a standalone golf stroke counter at this time. The $1 app cost will help to enhance our development projects. If you want a feature included. Please send me a email at android@securebucket.com For myself, I use this with golf shot. Thanks for your support!

Vysoko kvalitné TomTom mapy uložené vo vašom smartfóne (bez potreby mobilného internetu) Vám spolu s množstvom navigačných funkcií zabezpečia pohodlnú jazdu s istotou.
